hill1.title:
Hitachi Vantara
September 2019 → June 2021
hill1.description: At Hitachi, I worked on the Enterprise CRM platform, where my main focus was integrating the system for electronic tax filing. This solution processed a high volume of daily tasks for nearly 20 retail locations. My work involved building APIs to automate the tax submissions and optimizing the batch process. We put a lot of effort into improving logging and system reliability to keep everything running smoothly and stable, even during peak business periods.

hill2.title:
GBST
 April 2023 → November 2024
hill2.description: For nearly two years, I played a part in a large financial project that manages retirement funds and complex money processes. My main job was creating the essential APIs for things like checking records, handling withdrawals, and organizing company contributions. On the user-facing side, I built and tuned React screens to handle huge amounts of data—my personal challenge was making sure tables with over 20,000 rows always felt responsive and fast. I also worked closely with the QA and business teams to ensure everything we built was accurate, compliant, and maintained clean data.

hill3.title:
Freelance Project – Financial Trend Forecasting Dashboard
 June 2025 → September 2025
hill3.description: I spent a few months on a freelance gig creating a Python dashboard to predict financial trends. This was a great hands-on project where I set up parts of the data cleaning and the XGBoost model training pipeline for short-term forecasts. I gained some valuable experience applying Machine Learning to time-series data and figuring out the best prediction settings to make the model useful in real-life situations.
